name: Tap Water
description:
Controls
  • Spawn Water: Left Mouse Button
  • Adjust Spawn Size: Middle Mouse Button
  • Splash: Right Mouse Button
Sound Breakdown
  • Water tap
    • Single water tap sound (recorded at home)
    • Volume changes with water spawn rate
  • Water movement
    • Sound List:
      • 5 × small water swirl sound (recorded at home)
      • 5 × medium water swirl sound  (recorded at home)
      • Single loud water swirl loop (recorded at home)
    • We choose a category based on the amount of moving water pixels and randomly play a sound in that category.
  • Water falling
    • Sound List:
      • 5 × water drop sound (recorded at home)
      • Single quiet water flow loop  (recorded at home)
      • Single loud water flow loop (from Soundsnap)
    • Similar to water movement, but specifically deals with water falling faster than a speed threshold.
  • Splash
    • Sound List:
      • 4 × small water splash sound (recorded at home)
      • 2 × large water splash sound (recorded at home)
    • Based on how much water is affected by the splash
  • Other
    • The pitch of all water sound (not including water tap) is adjusted based on the water level.
